content: horizon hat by emily dormier materials 2 different colored skeins of worsted weight yarn one of each color size 8 16 inch circular needle size 8 double pointed needles tapestry needle gauge 20 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k-knit p-purl k2t-knit two together cast on 84 stitches on circular needle and join in the round rnds 1-8 with color a *k2 p2* round 9-13 knit with color a round 14 knit with color b color a round 15-18 knit with color a color b round 19-20 knit with color b round 21-23 knit with color a round 24-26 knit with color b round 27-28 knit with color a round 29-32 knit with color b round 33 knit with color a round 34-37 knit with color b transfer onto double pointed needles round 38 worked in color b *k5 k2t* repeat until end of round round 39 knit with color b round 40 worked in color b *k4 k2t* repeat until end of round round 41 knit with color b round 42 worked in color b *k3 k2t* repeat until end of round round 43 knit with color b round 44 worked in color b *k2 k2t* repeat until end of round rns 45 knit with color b round 46 worked in color b *k1 k2t* repeat until end of round round 47 worked in color b *k2t k1* cut the yarn with several inches to work with with a tapestry needle pull the yarn through all the remaining loops weave in ends
